description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Shortcake Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry Shortcake Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat cream with icing sugar and vanilla until soft peaks form. Top half of the biscuits with strawberry slices and cream and finish with another biscuit. Dust with extra icing sugar and serve. Note: Vanilla extract is different to vanilla essence.
